sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to inject new talent into the 1/2CR sniper section.
sections.KEY TASKS:

Assess candidates on as many sniper-critical skills as possible
Maintain accountability of all personnel and equipment
Ensure appropriate supervision through the events
